mapper.sql: AID, FID, CONTENT, ZID, TYPE, USEID, USEDID, USERNAME, USEREDNAME, createtime
mapper.select: select count(FID) from appraisal where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by FID

select
from huifupl where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by CREATETIME

mapper.update:
update huifupl
FID = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZID = #{zid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USEID = #{useid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USEDID = #{usedid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USEREDNAME = #{useredname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where AID = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update huifupl set FID = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZID = #{zid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEID = #{useid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USEDID = #{usedid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEREDNAME = #{useredname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where AID = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
